markdownRemark.html:
It’s time to modernize our political system and bring it into the 21st century, because what we have now clearly isn’t working. Most people I know have never heard of “liquid democracy”, so I made this video introducing the concept.

For a more in-depth explanation, I recommend reading Liquid Democracy: True Democracy for the 21st Century

I think this is one of the most exciting (and underrated) applications of blockchain technology, and there’s already a YC funded startup called democracy.earth working on a decentralized democratic governance protocol that enables token based liquid democracy.
